alert.note: Alert for Screven (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Charleston (the Southern end of South Carolina and Eastern Georgia)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 08 at 9:52PM EDT until further notice by NWS Charleston
info.description: ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM SATURDAY EVENING UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Savannah River at Burtons Ferry. * WHEN...From Saturday evening until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 15.0 feet, flooding of some adjacent agricultural lands occurs. Most boat ramps along the river are unusable. At 18.2 feet, the picnic area at Stoney Bluff Landing becomes flooded. Access to the house at the end of Stoney Bluff Landing Road is limited. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 845 PM EDT Friday, the stage was 14.5 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage Saturday evening and continue rising to 17.4 feet Wednesday evening. Additional rises are possible thereafter. - Flood stage is 15.0 feet. &&
